game.title: Eternal Realms
game.synopsis: In a world where magic and technology coexist, the realm of Eridoria is threatened by an ancient evil known as the Shadow. Players take on the role of a novice mage tasked with uncovering the truth behind the Shadow's return and saving their kingdom from destruction.
game.beginning: The game begins in the small village of Brindlemark, where the player receives a mysterious letter from the wizard Thorold requesting their presence at his tower. Upon arrival, Thorold reveals that he has been studying an ancient prophecy foretelling the return of the Shadow and believes the player to be the chosen one.
game.ending: With the Shadow defeated and Eridoria saved, the player is hailed as a hero and Thorold's apprentice. However, a new threat emerges in the form of a rogue mage seeking to claim the power of the Shadow for themselves. The player must once again take up their mantle and defend their kingdom against this new menace.
